Phrenic Strike.name: Phrenic Strike
Phrenic Strike.flavor: You fight past your enemy’s attack to deliver a punishing blow to its body and mind.
Phrenic Strike.trigger: An enemy hits you with a melee attack
Phrenic Strike.effect: Before the attack, you shift 1 square.
Phrenic Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Thought Interloper.name: Thought Interloper
Thought Interloper.flavor: You lay open your opponent’s mental barriers, ravaging its mind and reading its every move in combat.
Thought Interloper.effect: The target is affected by your thought interloper (save ends). While the target is affected by the interloper, it takes ongoing 5 psychic damage and its attacks provoke opportunity attacks from you.
Thought Interloper.eachFailedSavingThrow: One ally adjacent to the target can make a melee basic attack against the target as a free action.

Mind's Bitter Betrayal.name: Mind's Bitter Betrayal
Mind's Bitter Betrayal.flavor: Your focused concentration lets you bolster your allies with energy drawn from your enemies’ uncertainty.
Mind's Bitter Betrayal.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of the encounter or until you end the effect as a free action during your turn. The zone moves with you, remaining centered on you. While within the zone, enemies grant combat advantage to you, and allies gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses. Until the zone ends, you are slowed.
